attributes.action: Urge the Board of the mighty Crystal Palace Football Club to appoint ammiller to be the new PA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rob Fox has carried out a fantastic job as the PA at Selhurst Park for many years now.However due to other commitments he has retired from the role.

To fill such a star is a very hard job but Mr A M Miller has both the enthuisasm and the abilty to fufil this very demanding role.

We urge the PM, in his final days at Number 10, to support this appointment

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
